name: Addressbar Meta Theme Color
author: William Patton

sections.description: Use this plugin to output the required meta tag to change the address bar color in various mobile browsers.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install from inside the admin interface.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit the customizer to select the color you want the address bar to appear for mobile users.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install from inside the admin interface.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit the customizer to select the color you want the address bar to appear for mobile users.

short_description: Changes the address bar colour for users with mobile browsers (works in Chrome and Opera).
description: Use this plugin to output the required meta tag to change the address bar color in various mobile browsers.
